title: The scornful ladie A comedie. As it was acted (with great applause) by the Children of Her Maiesties Reuels in the Blacke Fryers. Written byFra. Beaumont and Io. Fletcher, Gent.
author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
publisher: Printed [by J. Beale] for Myles Partritch, are to be sold at his shop at the George neere St. Dunstons Church in Fleet-streete,
